titleInfo.title: New relations between territory and space: changing borders in Western Europe and North America.
The U.S.-Mexico Border. Transcending Divisions, Contesting Identities.

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Albert, Mathias, and Brock, Lothar. 1998. “New relations between territory and space: changing borders in Western Europe and North America.”. In The U.S.-Mexico Border. Transcending Divisions, Contesting Identities., ed. David Spener and Kathleen Staudt, 215-232. Boulder: Lynne Rienner.
